entry.title: [WAW1][Dedicated Servers] - Room W12 W14 W16
entry.content:
Jun 23, 14:02 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 16/06/2023 16:47 UTC
End Time : 16/06/2023 20:45 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in rooms W12, W14 and W16 were temporarily unavailable
Root cause : An electrical equipment caused the incident
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 21, 12:31 UTC
Update - Impacted rooms are currently using our main power supply.
There is no impact on our services.
In the meantime, our technical teams are performing electrical works to ensure that the situation is in a nominal state.

Jun 21, 01:35 UTC
Update - Impacted rooms continue to use the emergency electrical distribution.
We are available to use this solution for several days. There is no impact on our services.
Our technical teams are hands on the issue to resolve the situation.
Update will be post tomorrow.

Jun 20, 01:35 UTC
Update - The emergency electrical distribution remain in use.
We are available to use this solution for several days. There is no impact on our services.
We continue to work on resolving the issue.
Update will be post tomorrow.

Jun 17, 07:24 UTC
Update - Since friday at 18:20 UTC, we are currently on an emergency electrical distribution on those rooms.
We are available to use this solution for several days. There is no impact on our services
Our technicians are currently working to get back to the main electrical distribution network
We will made situation update on Monday to keep you informed

Jun 17, 06:16 UTC
Update - At this time, we confirmed that all services are operational
Our team are still working to came back to a nominal situation

Jun 16, 20:45 UTC
Monitoring - All the services are currently operational.
We are still running on our backup equipment.
In the meantime, we are still working to restore the service as nominal

Jun 16, 19:29 UTC
Identified - Update : Services are in the process of being restored. Our backup equipments is ensuring continuity of service.
Our teams are working to resolve the situation definitively.

Jun 16, 17:42 UTC
Investigating - Start Time : 16/06/2023 16:47 UTC
Service impacted : Some servers were unavailable.
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
